how did you start your afternoon ??

paragraphs.text: The geeks have risen, we are in demand and have the freedom and power to pick and choose the role we want. For a group of individuals who were likely marginalised and made to feel weak and insignificant as children, this is a powerful and seductive feeling. The gung-ho attitude of many startups can exacerbate and manipulate these feelings to fever point. Making you honestly feel like you are changing the world and that the world owes you a favour, when you’re actually making another damned dating app.
paragraphs.name: bfd7

paragraphs.text: In conclusion, looping back to me wanting to link my initial idea to recent world events. What the world needs more of right now is understanding, and we are in a perfect position to show it.
paragraphs.name: 4dc8

4406e7342ea9.title: Yes… I am approaching this age and I wonder how much the ability to work remotely will affect the…

paragraphs.text: Yes… I am approaching this age and I wonder how much the ability to work remotely will affect the age issue, as maybe you will never see each other in person. But the age issue has been increasingly bothering me, though it doesn’t seem as bad in Europe…
paragraphs.name: b911

2a3c85a2abb1.title: Technology is one of the few areas where people discriminate against experience.

paragraphs.text: Technology is one of the few areas where people discriminate against experience.

I don’t think that age discrimination is as bad in Europe. Or even on the East Coast of the United States. Age discrimination is the worst in California, where young men in hoodies who found startups are worshiped like living gods. Or at least the next imagined Zuckerbergs, which is seen as the same thing.
paragraphs.name: de66

ac99d9a885e3.title: I’m sorry but I don’t consider myself to be so ‘privileged’ to be in the tech industry.

paragraphs.text: I’m sorry but I don’t consider myself to be so ‘privileged’ to be in the tech industry. Sure, those in the tech industry make higher than average wages, but we have to work hard to maintain those wages — constantly learning new skills. We also do not have any guild to protect our professional status like doctors or lawyers do. Nothing is stopping…

8b265eb1a5d8.title: While I think it’s wonderful you’re trying to be more conscious of how others may have felt in the…

paragraphs.text: While I think it’s wonderful you’re trying to be more conscious of how others may have felt in the past, I don’t think it’s fair of you to assume full responsibility for someone else feeling weak and insignificant. If you’re talking about immigrant communities in particular, very often it’s their families and ones close to them who often make them…

ce4800ae0048.title: You’re in demand as long as you’re under 40.

paragraphs.text: You’re in demand as long as you’re under 40. After that it will not matter what you have done, what you are currently doing and what you know. At some point people will not hire you because of your age. Your days of privilege are numbered.
paragraphs.name: 4e30

9590929fa8f6.title: Actually here I wasn’t talking about immigrant communities in particular, but bullying too, in fact…

paragraphs.text: Actually here I wasn’t talking about immigrant communities in particular, but bullying too, in fact that’s what was most in my mind. Of course I’m not suggesting that one should feel fully responsible for making someone feel a particular way (unless of course you are), but be conscious of it.

e7fcef4648b0.title: Yes! Thank you for your writing and addressing this issue.

paragraphs.text: Yes! Thank you for your writing and addressing this issue. I think this is something that is all to often left out in the tech world — power as much as privilege — and it is for me one of the most important things that should be discussed. People also have a right to (and are able to) understand at least the logics of the technologies they use…
